channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office

item.title: CVE-2022-46869|2024-10-01T16:55:33.385Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation during installation due to improper soft link handling. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 40278.

item.title: CVE-2022-46868|2024-10-01T17:48:38.944Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation during recovery due to improper soft link handling. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 40173.

item.title: CVE-2022-45451|2024-10-01T17:50:36.690Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to insecure driver communication port permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 40173, Acronis Agent (Windows) before build 30600, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows) before build 30984.

item.title: CVE-2023-41743|2024-10-01T17:32:05.640Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to insecure driver communication port permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 40278, Acronis Agent (Windows) before build 31637, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows) before build 35979.
